channel.title: Runecrafting Error -- Rep++
channel.description:
A player on my server noticed that when you leave the air alter you will be teleported to the donator zone. I could not find a way to change this, as I did not do too much to the runecrafting skill, much less did I edit where it takes you. Lolll, well, if you know how to change the coordinates that you are sent to when you leave the air alter, that'd be greatly appreciated.
This is a 317 PI. :D

item.title: Runecrafting Error -- Rep++
item.dc:creator: @InfectedWhore InfectedWhore
item.description:
@InfectedWhore wrote:

Find out the Portal ID of the Air Altar’s portal.

Go into your ActionHandler.Java and search ‘case PORTAL_ID:’.

Find the co-ordinates that portal is set to taking you(your donator zone)and change them to take you home, or wherever else.

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting Error -- Rep++
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

Nah, not the same portal. When you teleport to the donator zone, it’s a different coordinate anyways (about 5 spaces away), so that can’t be the issue.

Thanks though!

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting Error -- Rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Probably using the same portal to get to the altar as the donator zone. Just use a different portal?

Read full topic
